briefTitle: To Study Generic Diclofenac Sodium Topical Gel 1% in the Treatment of Osteoarthritis of the Knee (Degenerative Joint Disease Presented as Joint Pain, Stiffness, Swelling and Restricted Motion).
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel-Design, Multiple-Site Clinical Study to Evaluate the Therapeutic Equivalence of Diclofenac Sodium Gel, 1% (Glenmark Pharmaceuticals Ltd) to Voltaren速 Gel (Diclofenac Sodium Topical Gel) 1% (Novartis Consumer Health, Inc) in Patients With Osteoarthritis (OA) of the Knee
summary: This is a Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel-Design, Multiple-Site Clinical Study to Evaluate the Therapeutic Equivalence of Diclofenac Sodium Gel, 1% (Glenmark Pharmaceuticals Ltd) to Voltaren速 Gel (Diclofenac Sodium topical gel) 1% (Novartis Consumer Health, Inc) in Patients with Osteoarthritis (OA) of the Knee

primaryOutcome.measure: Absolute Change in the Total WOMAC (Western Ontario and McMaster Universities Arthritis Index) Pain Subscale Score for the Target Knee
